entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Kirkland Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -28.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kirkland Lake 3:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
Temperature: -28.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -41
Dewpoint: -35.2°C
Wind: NW 19 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
